events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product was not what I expected and I would like to request a refund for it.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message regarding the unsatisfactory product.
The case has been assigned to customer service representative John for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about your issue. I’ll be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a brief description of why the product did not meet your expectations?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product arrived damaged and the color was different from what was shown on the website.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and you will receive a confirmation email shortly.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. Thank you very much for resolving this issue promptly.
The refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3–5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and everything is satisfactory on your end. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support and have a great day!
We have sent you a satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback is important to us.
